articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Unstable sunspot explodes, sparks BLACKOUTS on Earth; Solar storm in the offing? - HT Tech
articles.description: An unstable sunspot, AR3327, has exploded producing a solar flare that triggered radio blackouts over Africa. More solar flares are expected to erupt in the days to come. Will a major solar storm hit the Earth soon?
articles.content: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) reported on Monday that the high number of sunspots on the Earth-facing side of the Sun can become a concern as some of them could go unstab… [+2741 chars]
